inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: karyotype study revealed 45X and confirmed the diagnosis of Turner syndrome

inclusion.criterion: Age ranged from eight to fifteen years
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Communication problems such as intellectual disability, autism, or Down syndrome

notes: Patient is a 12 year old girl with Turner syndrome, treating with GH since 6 months ago without estrogen therapy.
